page.title: 13Leisure Activities in Stone
page.content: There is a band and two choirs.Stone Town Band is a brass band, Stone Choral Society is a mixed voice choir and the Stonefield Singers are a male voice choir. The Stone Music Festival is held every Spring and attracts entrants from all over the country. The library is in the Market Square. In Westbridge Park you can play football,have a rest or play on the swings, slides and roundabouts. Stone Festival Week centres around Westbridge Park each June.There are such events as B.M.X. racing, a parade in the High Street and a fair. Leisure clubs include St. Michael's Social Club, the Royal Naval Club and Stone Bridge Club.
